When: You should _already_ know! It's on October 19th-21st!
HackUPC starts on October 19th at 3PM and ends at 5PM on the 21st :timer_clock:
Where: HackUPC is located in UPC Campus Nord :world_map: See https://goo.gl/maps/usj7JrdQgfx
HackUPC happens at FIB, UPC Campus Nord, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain, Europe, World, Solar System, Milky Way, Universe. :smirk:
The sunny Barcelona is the location of HackUPC :sunny:
